name: df-carsg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ccarsg, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cpw(cuni(cdm(cv(s0)))), wral(s2, cpw(cuni(cdm(cv(s0)))), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s0), cin(cv(s2), cv(s1))), cxad, cfv(cv(s0), cdif(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ toCaraSiga =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(s0))| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(s0)),((s0 `(s2 ‚ãÇ s1))[+](s0 `(s2 \ s1)))=(s0 ` s2))})
comment: Define a function constructing Caratheodory measurable sets for a given outer measure. See ~ carsgval for its value. Definition 1.11.2 of [Bogachev] p. 41. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2020.)
